duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and achieve maximum sales profitability, growth, and market penetration.
Contact and secure new business accounts and customers through a relationship-based approach.
Demonstrate products and services to existing and potential customers, assisting them in selecting those best suited to their needs.
Implement the overall sales strategy for the business.
Cultivate lasting customer relationships, understand business needs of customers, and grow customer loyalty.
Manage sales activity reports and coordinate with project managers and other sales team members.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree preferred in Marketing, Business Administration, or relevant field
